mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studio(studio_name, studio_name_pin,studio_pic, studio_money, studio_phone, studio_monthly_sales, studio_QQ, studio_briefIntroduction, studio_collection_nmuber, studio_del, system_userid) VALUE (#{studioName},#{studioNamePin} ,#{studioPic},#{studioMoney},#{studioPhone},#{studioMonthlySales},#{studioQq}, #{studioBriefintroduction},#{studioCollectionNmuber},#{studioDel},#{systemUserid})
mapper.update: UPDATE studio SET studio_del =1 WHERE studio_id=#{_parameter}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM studio WHERE studio_id=#{_parameter} AND studio_del=0;

SELECT studio.studio_collection_nmuber AS studioCollectionNmuber , studio_monthly_sales AS studioMonthlySales,studio_money AS studioMoney,studio_briefIntroduction AS studioBriefintroduction, studio_QQ AS studioQq,studio.system_userid AS systemUserid,system.system_user_loginname AS systemUserName, studio.studio_name AS studioName,studio.studio_phone AS studioPhone,studio.studio_pic AS studioPic FROM studio LEFT JOIN system ON studio.system_userid=system.system_userid WHERE studio_id= #{_parameter} AND studio_del=0;

SELECT studio_id,studio_name,studio_briefIntroduction,studio_pic,studio_collection_nmuber, studio_money, studio_monthly_sales,studio_phone,studio_QQ,system_userid from studio WHERE studio_name_pin LIKE '%${_parameter}%' AND studio_del=0
